definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: The painter swept a brush over his canvas.
sentences.chinese: 画家的画笔在画布上飞掠。

sentences.english: Tie the paintbrushes up into bundles and put them away carefully.
sentences.chinese: 把画笔束成捆，然后好好收藏起来。

sentences.english: Hit B to select the Brush Tool and make sure the color is pure white.
sentences.chinese: 点击乙选择画笔工具，并确保颜色是纯白色。

sentences.english: Even now during my part-time, I drew some goldfish for pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 闲暇时光有时会拿起画笔，画金鱼玩。

sentences.english: She picks up her sketchbook and retrieves the charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起了了她的写生本和画笔。

sentences.english: Do you have anything OI can use to improve the pointing of my brushes in my left hand.
sentences.chinese: 你有什么差异可以用来改善指着我的画笔在我的左手。

sentences.english: It’s a bit like having a palette of colors to dip your paintbrush in.
sentences.chinese: 这就像用画笔蘸着调色板里的颜料一样。

sentences.english: Get the richness of pixel-based brushes AND the scalability of vectors.
sentences.chinese: 基于像素的画笔和丰富的可扩展性载体。

sentences.english: He dipped the brush into the paint bucket.
sentences.chinese: 他拿画笔蘸颜料桶中的颜料。

sentences.english: His romantic life began when he first touched a painting brush.
sentences.chinese: 当第一次接触画笔，他的传奇一生就开始了。

sentences.english: He saw her for a some minutes, then lent her brush and proven his assistance.
sentences.chinese: 他观察了几分钟，然后向她借了画笔并一试身手。

sentences.english: For Stigler his camera was his brush.
sentences.chinese: 对于施蒂格勒来说，照相机就是他的画笔。

sentences.english: He watched her for a few minutes, adidas Copa Mundial, then borrowed her brush and tried his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他观察了几分钟，然后向她借了画笔并一试身手。

sentences.english: My quills and brushes will never be enough.
sentences.chinese: 用我的钢笔和画笔都不能够。

sentences.english: squeeze lines of glue along the flush, cut edges and use the paint brush to even it along the top edge.
sentences.chinese: 把胶水挤在平齐的切边上，用画笔涂匀。

sentences.english: Paintbrushes and watercolors bring out the memories of childhood.
sentences.chinese: 画笔和水彩将我带回到童年时代。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
